title: v.248 Update Preview - MapleStory X KONOSUBA

title: v.248 - MapleStory X KONOSUBA Update Preview
content: The heroes from the anime KONOSUBA have joined the Adventurers of MapleStory in this explosive crossover!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - February 15, 2024
content: We will be performing a scheduled maintenance on Thursday, February 15, 2024 at 7:00 AM PST (10:00 AM EST / 4:00 PM CET / 2:00 AM AEDT Feb. 16).
